snippet: Ralph Steadman and Ceri Levy have created a book of surprised, silly, sullen, sad, extinct, real and unreal birds.
abstract: Book Extinct Boids by artist Ralph Steadman and co-author Ceri Levi is an imaginative and energetically illustrated compendium of real, extinct and fictive birds.
lead_paragraph: Ralph Steadman and Ceri Levy have created a book of surprised, silly, sullen, sad, extinct, real and unreal birds.

headline.seo: A Joyful Splash of Plumage in ‘Extinct Boids’
headline.main: New Book Brings Joyful Splash of Plumage, Real and Imagined
headline.print_headline: New Book Brings Joyful Splash of Plumage, Real and Imagined
